text:
For years they were Hollywood's most talked 
about couple. Today we're learning English

with Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie. In this 
lesson you'll learn lots of vocabulary with

scenes from the movie Mr. and Mrs. Smith which is 
a great movie but also famous because it's when

Angelina and Brad actually fell in love. We'll 
also learn with an interview and some clips from

another famous movie that they made called By the 
sea. And if you want to avoid any spoilers the

only scene you need to avoid is scene C. But 
before we begin and in case you're new here,

every week we make lessons just like this 
one, to help you learn fast native English!

Without getting lost, without missing the jokes 
and without subtitles. Just like Zain who says

that our channel is helping him prepare for the 
IELTS exam. So be sure to hit that subscribe

button and the bell down below, that way you 
will not miss a single one of our new lessons!

If you'd like to learn more about 
how natives connect their speech and

also the vocabulary that we use, then I highly 
recommend our Fluent with Friends course.

In this course, you'll learn with 
the first two seasons of Friends,

you'll receive PDF Power Lessons, 
vocabulary memorization software

and access to our Fluency Circle Global community, 
where you can meet English learners just like you!

But the best part is you can try it right now for 
free with our three-part Masterclass! All you have

to do is click up here or down in the description 
box below to learn more and sign up now!

If you're enjoying this lesson, then 
I highly recommend you check out this
lesson we made with Brad Pitt's appearance in

Friends! You can click up here or down in 
the description box below to watch it next.
